function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential for the spread of contagious diseases within healthcare facilities due to suboptimal building automation and control systems (BACS) design and functionality.","Impact":"Increased risk of healthcare-associated infections, compromised patient safety, and potential public health crisis.","Mitigation":"Implementation of advanced BACS with features such as air quality monitoring, ventilation control, and contactless systems to reduce the risk of disease transmission.","Technologies":"Advanced sensors, smart ventilation systems, contactless interfaces, and AI-based analytics for real-time monitoring and control.","People":"Patients, healthcare workers, visitors, and the general public.","Owner":"Building management, facility maintenance teams, healthcare administrators, and government health agencies."}]}
